posts.name: Fedor Indutny
posts.cooked:
Hello everyone! The Signal team is releasing a new version of Signal Desktop, v7.51.0-beta.1. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta here.

Release notes:

  • Fire, the wheel, and electricity were all great developments, but they were merely necessary steps along the path that created the conditions for animated GIF search to exist. Now you can experience the pinnacle of human technological advancement in Signal Desktop with a brand-new selection interface that makes it easy to quickly find an emoji, sticker, or animated GIF that’s perfect for the moment.
  • We also resized the picture-in-picture window and added convenient new shortcuts to mute/unmute your microphone or turn the camera on/off while a call is minimized.

Commit changes: Comparing v7.50.0-beta.1…v7.50.1-beta.1 · signalapp/Signal-Desktop · GitHub

link_counts.title: Add GIF search (GIPHY) to Signal Desktop

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.51.0-beta.1

52 new commits since 7.50.0-beta.1:

Show commits

  • v7.51.0-alpha.1 [1]

  • Calling: Add cache for relay server requests [2]

  • Improve remote participant rendering performance [3]

  • Parallelize get-strings [4]

  • beforeMessageSend: Properly update last message with active send [5]

  • Expanded local preview: Don't overlap controls when audio-only/reconnecting [6]

  • Upgrade libsignal to 0.68.0 [7]

  • Bump electron from 35.1.0 to 35.1.2 [8]

  • Fix group link wrapping in convo details [9]

  • Fix rendering non/overly-qualified emoji in emojify [10]

  • Update inter to 4.1 [11] (reverted by [15])

  • Show mute icon in 1:1 calls for remote party (#10074) [12]

  • Use transform: translate for call participants [13]

  • Fix gradient showing instead of placeholder when Avatar URL loading fails [14]

  • Revert "Update inter to 4.1" [15] (reverts [11])

  • Fix sticker rendering with bad content-type [16]

  • Update Backup Media download progress indicator for narrow left panes [17]

  • Local preview: Ensure background blur is opaque to items behind it [18]

  • [signalapp/Signal-Desktop#7242] Allow collapsing archive sidebar [19]

  • Migrate remaining emoji/sticker pickers to fun picker [20]

  • Fix avatar not showing for new group adds with trusted contact [21]

  • Show backup status in Settings window [22]

  • Avoid CropAndScale calls in RingRTC [23]

  • Update release notes [24]

  • Update strings [25]

  • Update DNS fallback [26]

  • Use Libsignal to validate sealed-sender certificates [27]

  • Fix icu string [28]

  • Fix restarting provisioner loop [29]

  • Better preload time counting [30]

  • Update electron to 35.1.4 [31]

  • Fix internal logo size [32]

  • Update backup handling of messages with an expireTimer [33]

  • Fix avatar color consistency [34]

  • Do not show emojis when displaying name only [35]

  • Move websocket preconnect earlier into startup [36]

  • Update attachment error handling for 403 status responses [37]

  • Add remaining features to fun picker [38]

  • Update to the latest SignalService.proto [39]

  • Calling: Improve the Picture-in-Picture popout [40]

  • Fix local preview width [41]

  • Lazy-load mac-screen-share C++ addon [42]

  • Override electron/node-gyp dependency [43]

  • Override electron/node-gyp dependency [44]

  • Translate emoji names everywhere [45]

  • Add modal alert for users with critical-idle-primary-device alert [46]

  • Actually fix local preview container size [47]

  • Add danger rule to check all pnpm-lock.yaml dependencies have integrity [48]

  • Fix link-and-sync cancellation [49]

  • Release notes for 7.51 [50]

  • Update strings [51]

  • 7.51.0-beta.1 [52]

No tabs in the emoji picker?

Did the app restart after updating?

posts.name: Trevor Biller
posts.cooked: Hey all, I just updated the feature flag for the GIF picker – it should show up now after an app restart. Sorry for the inconvenience!
Can confirm it is now working as it should. Thanks for the help!
